adaptability.name: Adaptability
adaptability.description: Human versatility grants a brief boost to all attributes.

shadow_spark.name: Shadow Spark
shadow_spark.description: A flicker of occult energy lashes out at the target.

inner_focus.name: Inner Focus
inner_focus.description: A moment of clarity heightens reflexes.

quick_thrust.name: Quick Thrust
quick_thrust.description: A swift, precise thrust aimed at a weak point.

arcane_affinity.name: Arcane Affinity
arcane_affinity.description: Innate arcane talent enhances magical potency.

shadow_step.name: Shadow Step
shadow_step.description: You slip briefly into shadow, becoming harder to strike.

umbral_bolt.name: Umbral Bolt
umbral_bolt.description: A bolt of condensed darkness that weakens the target.

forest_step.name: Forest Step
forest_step.description: Graceful movement inspired by the forest.

frost_touch.name: Frost Touch
frost_touch.description: A chilling touch slows the target.

stone_skin.name: Stone Skin
stone_skin.description: Skin hardens like stone, increasing defense.

blood_rush.name: Blood Rush
blood_rush.description: A surge of bloodlust increases attack power.

scrap_toss.name: Scrap Toss
scrap_toss.description: A thrown piece of junk deals minor damage.

ambush_club.name: Ambush Club
ambush_club.description: A heavy ambush strike disrupts the target.

feral_lunge.name: Feral Lunge
feral_lunge.description: A sudden predatory leap that tears into the target.

pounce.name: Pounce
pounce.description: A swift pounce that boosts evasiveness.

pack_spirit.name: Pack Spirit
pack_spirit.description: Loyal pack instincts inspire allies to move faster.

rending_swipe.name: Rending Swipe
rending_swipe.description: A powerful swipe that rends flesh.

boar_charge.name: Boar Charge
boar_charge.description: A reckless charge that knocks the target off balance.

ember_breath.name: Ember Breath
ember_breath.description: A cone of heated embers scorches nearby foes.

glacial_scales.name: Glacial Scales
glacial_scales.description: Frost‑hardened scales increase resistance to damage.

thunder_snap.name: Thunder Snap
thunder_snap.description: A crackling burst of lightning jolts the target.

crystal_shard.name: Crystal Shard
crystal_shard.description: A razor‑sharp shard of crystal is launched at the target.

bone_rattle.name: Bone Rattle
bone_rattle.description: A rattling shriek weakens the target’s resolve.

frenzied_claw.name: Frenzied Claw
frenzied_claw.description: A savage claw attack that tears flesh.

infernal_spike.name: Infernal Spike
infernal_spike.description: A spike of infernal energy pierces the target.

void_shard.name: Void Shard
void_shard.description: A fragment of void energy is hurled at the target.

entropy_touch.name: Entropy Touch
entropy_touch.description: A destabilizing touch weakens physical structure.

ember_spark.name: Ember Spark
ember_spark.description: A flickering ember leaps from your hand, igniting the target.

ice_skin.name: Ice Skin

static_burst.name: Static Burst
static_burst.description: A sudden discharge of static electricity jolts the target.

stone_grip.name: Stone Grip
stone_grip.description: Earthen force grips the target, slowing their movements.

glimmer_dust.name: Glimmer Dust
glimmer_dust.description: A sprinkle of enchanted dust disorients the target.

barkskin.name: Barkskin
barkskin.description: Your skin hardens like bark, increasing defense.

fae_prank.name: Fae Prank
fae_prank.description: A mischievous illusion throws off the target’s aim.

stone_fist.name: Stone Fist
stone_fist.description: A heavy stone punch crushes the target.

gear_spin.name: Gear Spin

metal_clang.name: Metal Clang
metal_clang.description: A hollow clang of metal slams into the target.

vine_whip.name: Vine Whip

pollen_burst.name: Pollen Burst

corrosive_spray.name: Corrosive Spray

gelatinous_crush.description: A massive gelatinous slam crushes the target.

razor_swipe.name: Razor Swipe

venom_fang.name: Venom Fang
venom_fang.description: A venomous bite inflicts lingering poison.

psychic_lash.name: Psychic Lash
psychic_lash.description: A mental spike disrupts the target’s thoughts.

void_tentacle.name: Void Tentacle

cosmic_gaze.name: Cosmic Gaze

entropy_beam.name: Entropy Beam
entropy_beam.description: A beam of unraveling energy destabilizes the target’s form.

necrotic_touch.name: Necrotic Touch

adhesive_grip.name: Adhesive Grip

maul.name: Maul

amorphous_shift.description: Your form shifts unpredictably, making attacks harder to land.

junk_bolt.description: A makeshift projectile cobbled together from scrap.

glacial_roar.name: Glacial Roar

umbra_wave.description: A wave of shadow energy weakens the target.

venom_lash.name: Venom Lash
venom_lash.description: A venom‑coated strike lashes across the target.

null_burst.description: A burst of null energy disrupts magical flow.

rift_howl.name: Rift Howl
rift_howl.description: A howl resonating from the rift instills primal terror.

void_rend.name: Void Rend

aether_surge.name: Aether Surge
aether_surge.description: A surge of woven aether strikes the target.

guardian_ray.name: Guardian Ray

chaos_pounce.name: Chaos Pounce
